job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement full-stack solutions for time-series anomaly detection, generative AI solutions, tabular data classification, and alert prioritization.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of designing and implementing solutions, which includes integrating various AI/ML techniques into a full-stack application.

job_tasks.phrase: working closely with our main engineering team to make these innovations come to life.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration with a core engineering team to bring developed solutions into production, a key aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: create seamless, efficient processes and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the engineering practice of building and optimizing processes and solutions, aligning with software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the product development lifecycle from conception to deployment, ensuring that solutions are scalable, efficient, and meet user needs.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development process, emphasizing scalability and efficiency, which are core software engineering concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: Coding and CI/CD: Solid experience with code versioning, continuous integration, and continuous deployment tools, like Git, Github Actions, and Pytest, is expected. You know your way around code reviews and value maintaining high-quality codebases.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions CI/CD tools and practices (Git, Github Actions, Pytest, code reviews) which fall under MLOps/DevOps for software development.

job_tasks.phrase: designing the methodology of a wide range of models used in the Trading book.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the core ML task of designing model methodologies, even though the specific models are not generative.

job_tasks.phrase: time-series anomaly detection, generative AI solutions, tabular data classification
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific types of ML/AI models that the candidate will be involved in developing and implementing, covering both traditional ML and GenAI.
This phrase directly indicates work with generative AI, which often involves prompt engineering or RAG techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Our ideal candidate is an individual who with a solid data science background, has experience in being embedded in software engineering practices while retaining a great amount of product thinking and creative problem-solving.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'solid data science background' implies data handling and analysis, which are foundational to data engineering for ML.

job_tasks.phrase: You will play a crucial role in conducting product research, developing proof of concepts (POCs) for groundbreaking solutions
job_tasks.justification: Developing POCs often involves data exploration and preparation, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the charge in exploring and defining the future of data quality tooling at Soda, focusing on automating mundane tasks to allow for more significant problem-solving opportunities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes a strategic role in defining product direction and automating tasks, which requires business understanding.
This directly relates to understanding the business context and user requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: communicating directly with customers to understand their needs on new and current products (with the help of a product manager).
job_tasks.justification: Direct customer interaction to understand needs is a key aspect of business understanding and product strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: thrives on being at the forefront of innovative data quality tooling
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a drive for innovation and being at the cutting edge.
Directly mentions problem-solving as a key skill.

soft_skills.phrase: developing proof of concepts (POCs) for groundbreaking solutions
soft_skills.justification: Developing POCs and groundbreaking solutions implies innovation and taking ownership of new ideas.

soft_skills.phrase: Your ability to innovate and solve complex problems in these areas is key.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states the importance of problem-solving and innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: At your core, you're a problem solver. You excel at understanding user needs and technical challenges, brainstorming solutions, and learning new methods as necessary. You're comfortable admitting when you don't have all the answers but are confident in your ability to find them.
soft_skills.justification: This entire section is dedicated to problem-solving skills, including learning and admitting knowledge gaps while still finding solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with software engineers and other team members to create seamless, efficient processes and solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights collaboration with other team members and engineers.

soft_skills.phrase: Open to Learning: You're not just focused on data science. You're eager to dive into general software engineering projects and expand your skill set beyond AI and modeling.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states an openness to learning and expanding skill sets.

soft_skills.phrase: Close Collaboration with Software Engineers: Whether you've been an integral part of a full-stack engineering team or have a solid understanding of cross-disciplinary collaboration, your ability to work alongside front-end, back-end, and platform engineers is vital.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes close collaboration with software engineers and cross-disciplinary teamwork.

soft_skills.phrase: Community and Open-Source Minded: One of our products being Open-Source, you'll be interested to engage with and care for the community around the products we offer as part of that channel.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates engagement with a community, which requires communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Customer Obsessed: You are not afraid to and show an interest in communicating directly with customers to understand their needs on new and current products (with the help of a product manager). You're also more than willing to provide direct support to customers on products which fall under your scope of expertise.
soft_skills.justification: Direct communication with customers to understand needs and provide support falls under communication and collaboration.
This phrase indicates a willingness and ability to learn new methods.

profile.rationale: The role explicitly mentions designing and implementing 'generative AI solutions' (1.B.2) alongside traditional ML tasks like 'time-series anomaly detection' and 'tabular data classification' (1.B.1). It also heavily emphasizes core software engineering practices such as 'full-stack solutions', 'product development lifecycle from conception to deployment', 'scalable, efficient', and 'CI/CD' (1.A.1, 1.A.2). The technologies listed include both traditional ML tools (Sklearn, Decision Trees) and GenAI specific ones (OpenAI APIs). The balance of tasks and technologies, with a clear mention of generative AI, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning both generative AI solutions and traditional ML tasks, as well as a strong emphasis on software engineering practices and CI/CD. The technologies listed are also specific and align well with the role's description.
